short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instant grammar correction. No sign-up, no hassle; just polished writing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GrammarFix is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to help users improve their writing by fixing grammatical errors in real time. Powered by Googleâ€™s Gemini AI, it offers quick and accurate grammar suggestions, making your writing clearer and more professional. Whether you're drafting emails, composing LinkedIn posts, or writing reports, GrammarFix ensures your text is polished. Its intuitive interface is easy to use, and the light/dark mode provides a comfortable experience. Perfect for students, professionals, and casual writers, GrammarFix enhances everyday productivity by making your communication more effective and error-free.
